column1: 253399,Geriatrician,,"Explain medical procedures or test results to patients or family members
column3: Monitor patient progress or responses to treatments
column7: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
column9: Collect medical information from patients, family members or other medical professionals
column13: Refer patients to other health care practitioners or health resources
column15: Analyse test results to inform diagnosis or treatment
